title: The Law Reform (Commorientes) Act
description: Category: statute | Source: https://laws.moj.gov.jm/library/statute/the-law-reform-commorientes-act | Legal areas: Trusts and Estates

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. In all cases where, after the 27th December, 1968, two Presump-
                                                              tion of
or more persons have died in circumstances rendering it survivor-
uncertain which of them survived the other or others, such
deaths shall for all purposes affecting title to property, be
presumed to have occurred in order of seniority and accord-
ingly the younger shall be deemed to have survived the elder.
      me inclusion of this page is authorized by L.N. 480119731
